synopsis.text: Ichika's last day of school at Kamakura Girl's High School marks the beginning of an extraordinary summer. While cleaning an abandoned school building, the reserved 14-year-old stumbles upon an antique mirror and encounters Manatsu, a mysterious girl who resides within the mirror. In exchange for her lost cell phone charm, Manatsu tasks Ichika with experiencing the powers of 12 spiritual life forces known as Djinn. As Ichika embarks on this supernatural journey, she must unlock the true potential of these elemental spirits while navigating the complexities of friendship and self-discovery. Unbeknownst to her, the fate of the world may rest on her shoulders. Join Ichika and her friends Satsuki, Keiko, and the enigmatic Michiru as they traverse the magical world of the Djinn, forming unforgettable bonds and tackling challenges that will shape their lives forever.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
